email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to provide a freight quote for the shipment of 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is $25 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN TRADER, which has a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems reasonable, but we are looking to secure a better rate given the current market conditions. Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount considering our long-term business relationship?

Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day and the laycan details?

Thanks,
John Doe
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your prompt response. Considering our long-term relationship, we can offer a revised rate of $23 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $15,000 per day.

The laycan is from 2023-10-10 to 2023-10-20. Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $23 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we need to ensure that the laytime is sufficient. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best,
John Doe
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-10 and end on 2023-10-20. We can offer a laytime of 10 days with the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
John Doe
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
